PROJECTS

Here are some of the projects I've worked on

An E-learning platform and website for a robotics company.

SPACESTAGRAM

An instagram look alike that loads pictures from the NASA API. Built using Reactjs and Typescript

GAMEVIL

An e-commerce platform, GAMEVIL, built with React using Shopify as a headless commerce.

CUSMIK

A music web application built with JavaScript and SCSS

QUIZ APP

A quiz single page application with vanilla javascript. Questions are loaded by making fetch request to the Open Trivia API. Leaderboard was implemented using Firebase Realtime Database.

BLOG

A blog platform with WordPress as a headless Content Management System (CMS).
